name: Bitfinex
introduce: Bitfinex is a cryptocurrency exchange based founded in 2012. In addition to a suite of advanced trading features and charting tool, Bitfinex provides access to peer-to-peer (P2P) financing, an OTC market and margin trading for a wide selection of digital assets and derivatives trading. Bitfinex’s strategy focuses on delivering the best crypto trading experience for professional traders and liquidity providers around the world through the delivery of cutting-edge technology.
